explains: adj. 深情的；（尤指）凄婉的，脉脉含情的

sentences.en: There is something undeniably soulful about the eerie whine of the highland bagpipes.
sentences.cn: 高原风笛神秘的哀鸣有着不容置疑的深情。

sentences.en: It was a soulful time in my life, a period of growth and maturity.
sentences.cn: 这是我生命中一段沉浸于内心世界的时光，自己长大了，变得更加成熟。

sentences.en: Aston Pearl, a New York concierge firm, is recommending more soulful gifts.
sentences.cn: 纽约管家公司Aston Pearl推荐了更注重精神层面的礼品。
